text: Table 2 Novick classification of cavo-atrial tumour extension in patients with RCC* Level 1 Thrombus into IVC but <2 cm above the renal vein Level 2 Thrombus below the intrahepatic vena cava Level 3 Thrombus involves the intrahepatic vena cava but below the diaphragm Level 4 Thrombus involves the right atrium
